data.lyric:
[ti:One Mississippi]
[ar:Kane Brown]
[al:One Mississippi]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.40]One Mississippi - Kane Brown
[00:01.38]Lyrics by：Kane Brown/Jesse Frasure/Levon Gray/Ernest Keith Smith
[00:03.74]Composed by：Kane Brown/Jesse Frasure/Levon Gray/Ernest Keith Smith
[00:05.89]
[00:09.70]You and I
[00:10.71]
[00:12.29]Had this off and on so long
[00:14.66]You've been here then you've been gone
[00:16.57]
[00:17.18]So many times
[00:18.49]
[00:19.30]And every night
[00:20.32]
[00:21.50]Yeah I'm always bumpin' into you
[00:23.88]We do the same things we used to
[00:26.14]
[00:26.89]It's your place or it's mine so
[00:29.55]Oh oh oh oh oh
[00:34.63]Well I swear we're through with the lonely drunk and déjà vu
[00:39.21]Oh oh oh oh oh
[00:43.79]
[00:44.29]Five minutes out of downtown
[00:46.07]
[00:46.65]Ain't nothin' but a countdown
[00:48.80]One Mississippi two Mississippi three shots of whiskey
[00:52.14]Are you on your way
[00:53.81]Way tipsy baby come kiss me I can't wait I can't wait
[00:58.60]Mississippi two Mississippi three in the mornin'
[01:01.82]We'll be on our way
[01:03.52]So tipsy can't stop kissin' I can't wait I can't wait forever
[01:08.52]
[01:09.60]Mm every time I'm at this bar tap on the shoulder turn around
[01:14.18]
[01:14.93]And baby there you are
[01:17.08]And it's fire you're like this Bourbon hundred proof
[01:21.75]Yeah they don't burn the way you do
[01:23.86]
[01:24.42]Yeah we're better in the dark so
[01:27.30]Oh oh oh oh oh
[01:32.31]Well I swear we're through with the lonely drunk and déjà vu
[01:36.76]Oh oh oh oh oh
[01:41.83]Five minutes out of downtown
[01:44.14]Ain't nothin' but a countdown
[01:46.42]One Mississippi two Mississippi three shots of whiskey
[01:49.79]Are you on your way
[01:51.39]Way tipsy baby come kiss me I can't wait I can't wait
[01:56.13]Mississippi two Mississippi three in the mornin'
[01:59.31]We'll be on our way
[02:01.18]So tipsy can't stop kissin' I can't wait I can't wait forever
[02:06.26]
[02:14.56]Hey
[02:15.47]
[02:25.17]Kinda like that Georgia wind
[02:27.15]We'll be gone and back again
[02:29.42]But always wind up right back where we are
[02:32.43]
[02:32.97]Playin' roulette with our hearts
[02:35.28]And blowin' smoke rings in the dark yeah
[02:39.46]Oh oh oh oh oh
[02:44.27]Well I swear we're through with the lonely drunk and déjà vu
[02:48.78]Oh oh oh oh oh
[02:53.82]Five minutes out of downtown
[02:55.66]
[02:56.21]Ain't nothin' but a countdown
[02:58.40]One Mississippi two Mississippi three shots of whiskey
[03:01.82]Are you on your way
[03:03.56]Way tipsy baby come kiss me I can't wait I can't wait
[03:08.14]Mississippi two Mississippi three in the mornin'
[03:11.42]We'll be on our way
[03:13.08]So tipsy can't stop kissin' I can't wait I can't wait forever
[03:18.15]
[03:19.60]Every time I'm at this bar tap on the shoulder turn around
[03:23.79]
[03:24.39]And baby there you are
data.trans:
[ti:One Mississippi]
[ar:Kane Brown]
[al:One Mississippi]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.40]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.38]//
[00:03.74]//
[00:05.89]
[00:09.70]你和我
[00:10.71]
[00:12.29]拉拉扯扯了这么久
[00:14.66]你来到我身边 然后又离我而去
[00:16.57]
[00:17.18]往返无数次
[00:18.49]
[00:19.30]夜夜如此
[00:20.32]
[00:21.50]我总是能碰见你
[00:23.88]我们做着从前一起做的那些事
[00:26.14]
[00:26.89]这里属于你也属于我
[00:29.55]//
[00:34.63]我发誓我们结束了这寂寞的醉酒 还有似曾相识的错觉
[00:39.21]//
[00:43.79]
[00:44.29]离市中心五分钟车程
[00:46.07]
[00:46.65]除了倒计时什么也没有
[00:48.80]一秒 两秒 三杯威士忌
[00:52.14]你已经在路上了吗
[00:53.81]微醺的感觉 宝贝 来吻我 我等不及了 我等不及了
[00:58.60]一秒 两秒 凌晨三点
[01:01.82]我们会做我们该做的事
[01:03.52]喝得醉醺醺 无法停止亲吻 我等不及了 我不能永远等着
[01:08.52]
[01:09.60]每一次来到这间酒吧 肩膀上被轻敲了一下 转身
[01:14.18]
[01:14.93]宝贝 你就在我身后
[01:17.08]爱火燃起 你就像波旁威士忌 纯粹的烈度
[01:21.75]别人不能像你这样 让我激情燃烧
[01:23.86]
[01:24.42]在黑暗中我们更加自在
[01:27.30]//
[01:32.31]我发誓我们结束了这寂寞的醉酒 还有似曾相识的错觉
[01:36.76]//
[01:41.83]离市中心五分钟车程
[01:44.14]除了倒计时什么也没有
[01:46.42]一秒 两秒 三杯威士忌
[01:49.79]你已经在路上了吗
[01:51.39]微醺的感觉 宝贝 来吻我 我等不及了 我等不及了
[01:56.13]一秒 两秒 凌晨三点
[01:59.31]我们会做我们该做的事
[02:01.18]喝得醉醺醺 无法停止亲吻 我等不及了 我不能永远等着
[02:06.26]
[02:14.56]//
[02:15.47]
[02:25.17]有些像乔治亚州的风
[02:27.15]我们会离开 然后再回来
[02:29.42]但总是转一圈回到原地
[02:32.43]
[02:32.97]让我们的心玩着俄罗斯轮盘赌游戏
[02:35.28]在黑暗中吐着烟圈
[02:39.46]//
[02:44.27]我发誓我们结束了这寂寞的醉酒 还有似曾相识的错觉
[02:48.78]//
[02:53.82]离市中心五分钟车程
[02:55.66]
[02:56.21]除了倒计时什么也没有
[02:58.40]一秒 两秒 三杯威士忌 
[03:01.82]你已经在路上了吗
[03:03.56]微醺的感觉 宝贝 来吻我 我等不及了 我等不及了
[03:08.14]一秒 两秒 凌晨三点
[03:11.42]我们会做我们该做的事
[03:13.08]喝得醉醺醺 我等不及了 我不能永远等着
[03:18.15]
[03:19.60]每一次来到这间酒吧 肩膀上被轻敲了一下 转身
[03:23.79]
[03:24.39]宝贝 你就在我身后
